DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the _PredefinedType_ attribute is unset (e.g. because an _IfcActuatorType_ is associated), or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcActuatorTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcActuatorTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS (SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no actuator type object associated, i.e. the _IsTypedBy_ inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type _IfcActuatorType_.
